%%%%%%%%%%%%%  GENEREAL SETTINGS FILE FOR ALL TEMPLATES %%%%%%%%%%%%%


%%% FONT %%%
\usepackage[scaled=1]{helvet}
\renewcommand{\familydefault}{\sfdefault}

%%% Standard background PDF picture for the wohle page - usually with logo and CI elements, footer, header, ... %%%
\usepackage{eso-pic}
\newcommand\BackgroundPic{
\put(-2.35,0){
\parbox[b][\paperheight]{\paperwidth}{%
\vfill
\includegraphics{\StandardBackground} 
}}}

%%% Background PDF picture for the QR Invoice page %%%
\newcommand\BackgroundPicEZ{
\put(-2.35,0){
\parbox[b][\paperheight]{\paperwidth}{%
\vfill
\ifthenelse{\equal{\PrintOnPaper}{on}}{\includegraphics{\BackgroundESRwhite}}{\includegraphics{\BackgroundESRorange}}
}}}

%%% Background PDF picture for the QR Invoice page without footer %%%
\newcommand\BackgroundWithoutFooter{
\put(-2.35,0){
\parbox[b][\paperheight]{\paperwidth}{%
\vfill
\includegraphics{\BackgroundESRwhite}
}}}

%%% BEGIN - DO NOT CHANGE THIS %%%
\begin{document}
%%% END - DO NOT CHANGE THIS %%%

%%% BACKGROUND AND PAGE SETTINGS %%%
\AddToShipoutPicture{\BackgroundPic} % Needs to be here if a standard background picture is used.
\shorthandoff{"}
\pagestyle{empty}

%%% FONT %%%
\normalfont
